caption:
The photograph depicts a man at a landfill, actively throwing a wooden board. The man is dressed in light-colored trousers and a short-sleeved shirt, capturing a moment of physical exertion as he hurls the board using both hands. His posture and facial expression suggest a combination of concentration and effort. 

The background is densely filled with various types of discarded items, creating a chaotic and cluttered scene typical of a dump site. Visible trash includes crushed cans, plastic bottles, cardboard pieces, and other unidentifiable waste. Additionally, there are larger disposed items like furniture evident in the composition.

The environment has a dark, muted color palette, contrasting sharply with the brighter sky visible above the horizon in the background, which suggests it might be either dawn or dusk. This lends the image a somber or gritty feel, emphasizing the unglamorous but essential nature of waste management and disposal.
title: Tourist adds to litter in dump beside Lake Road (5-27) near Purvis.
placename: Ozarks, Lake of the, State Park (Mo.)
location: Ozarks, Lake of the, State Park, Missouri
